item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-18
item.description: Meta’s social VR platform Horizon hits 300,000 users (3 minute read) Meta released an update on Horizon’s user growth during its most recent earnings call.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-11
item.description: How to watch the debut of Tesla Model S Plaid, the ‘quickest production car ever made’ (4 minute read) Tesla revealed a new high-performance Plaid version of the Model S on Thursday on a livestream.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-14
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX inks satellite connectivity deal with Google Cloud (3 minute read) Google has signed a deal with SpaceX to use Starlink with its cloud unit.

item.title: Going from Wordpress to serverless, unhackable high-speed static websites
item.description: Going from Wordpress to serverless, unhackable high-speed static websites I have been building websites in the past, but have always been struggling with the slow performance of WordPress.

item.title: Top 6 best Cloud Storage services – Free, Paid and for Businesses
item.description: Why should I store my data in the cloud? The computing industry has moved gradually away from local storage to remote, server-based storage and computing since the rise of the internet — what has been known as the cloud.
